summary: This module implements mock representations of AWS EC2 Internet Gateways and Egress‑Only Internet Gateways, along with backend managers that handle their lifecycle operations such as creation, deletion, description, attachment to VPCs, and CloudFormation integration.
business_intent: To provide a simulated EC2 environment that allows developers and automated tests to interact with internet gateway resources without requiring real AWS infrastructure, enabling safe and repeatable testing of networking configurations and infrastructure‑as‑code templates.
